data.title: Lais Ribeiro Net Worth – Just Speak News
data.text:
Lais Ribeiro Net Worth: A Closer Look at the Brazilian Supermodel’s Success

Lais Ribeiro, a Brazilian supermodel, has made a name for herself in the fashion industry with her stunning looks and charismatic persona. Born on October 5, 1990, in Teresina, Piauí, Brazil, Lais Ribeiro has become one of the most recognized faces in the fashion world. With her incredible talent and hard work, she has garnered a significant net worth and achieved immense success. In this article, we will delve into Lais Ribeiro’s net worth, interesting facts about her, and answer common questions about her life and career.

1. Net Worth: As of the year 2024, Lais Ribeiro’s estimated net worth stands at a whopping $10 million. Her successful modeling career and lucrative brand endorsements have contributed significantly to her wealth.

2. Victoria’s Secret Angel: Lais Ribeiro gained international recognition when she became a Victoria’s Secret Angel in 2015. This prestigious title elevated her status in the fashion industry and opened doors to numerous opportunities.

3. Runway Success: Lais Ribeiro has graced the runways of top fashion shows around the world. She has walked for renowned designers, including Chanel, Louis Vuitton, Versace, and Marc Jacobs, among many others.

4. Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue: In 2016, Lais Ribeiro appeared in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue for the first time. Her captivating photoshoots and stunning swimwear looks garnered widespread attention and further solidified her position as a top model.

5. Philanthropy: Lais Ribeiro is not only a successful model but also a philanthropist. She actively supports various charitable causes, including the American Heart Association. Ribeiro has used her platform to raise awareness about heart health and encourage others to lead a healthy lifestyle.

6. Personal Life: Lais Ribeiro has a son named Alexandre, born in 2008. She has been open about the challenges of being a single mother while pursuing a demanding career in the fashion industry.

7. Height and Weight: Lais Ribeiro stands tall at 6 feet 1 inch (185 cm) and maintains a svelte figure with a weight of around 132 pounds (60 kg). Her statuesque beauty has made her a sought-after model for high-fashion and runway shows.

8. Relationship Status: As of 2024, Lais Ribeiro has been in a long-term relationship with her partner, Jared Homan, an American professional basketball player. The couple has been together for several years and often shares their love on social media.

Now, let’s move on to answering some common questions about Lais Ribeiro:

1. What is Lais Ribeiro’s age? Lais Ribeiro was born on October 5, 1990, which makes her 33 years old in 2024.

2. How tall is Lais Ribeiro? Lais Ribeiro stands at an impressive height of 6 feet 1 inch (185 cm).

3. What is Lais Ribeiro’s weight? Lais Ribeiro weighs approximately 132 pounds (60 kg).

4. Is Lais Ribeiro married? Lais Ribeiro is not married. However, she has been in a long-term relationship with Jared Homan.

5. Who is Lais Ribeiro dating? Lais Ribeiro is dating Jared Homan, an American professional basketball player.

6. How did Lais Ribeiro become famous? Lais Ribeiro gained fame through her successful modeling career and becoming a Victoria’s Secret Angel.

7. What is Lais Ribeiro’s net worth? Lais Ribeiro’s net worth is estimated to be around $10 million in 2024.

8. Which fashion shows has Lais Ribeiro walked in? Lais Ribeiro has walked in fashion shows for Chanel, Louis Vuitton, Versace, Marc Jacobs, and many other renowned designers.

9. Has Lais Ribeiro appeared in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue? Yes, Lais Ribeiro appeared in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue in 2016.

10. What philanthropic causes does Lais Ribeiro support? Lais Ribeiro actively supports the American Heart Association and raises awareness about heart health.

11. Does Lais Ribeiro have any children? Yes, Lais Ribeiro has a son named Alexandre, born in 2008.

12. How does Lais Ribeiro maintain her figure? Lais Ribeiro maintains her figure through a combination of a healthy diet and regular exercise.

13. Where was Lais Ribeiro born? Lais Ribeiro was born in Teresina, Piauí, Brazil.

14. What is Lais Ribeiro’s nationality? Lais Ribeiro is Brazilian.

15. Does Lais Ribeiro have any siblings? There is limited information available about Lais Ribeiro’s siblings.

16. What are Lais Ribeiro’s future plans? As of now, Lais Ribeiro continues to pursue her successful modeling career and aims to expand her brand endorsements.

17. What advice does Lais Ribeiro have for aspiring models? Lais Ribeiro advises aspiring models to believe in themselves, stay focused, and work hard to achieve their goals.

In summary, Lais Ribeiro has achieved remarkable success as a supermodel, earning an estimated net worth of $10 million by 2024. Her journey from a small town in Brazil to becoming a Victoria’s Secret Angel and walking for renowned designers is an inspiration to many. Alongside her professional endeavors, Lais Ribeiro actively supports charitable causes and continues to be a role model for aspiring models worldwide.
